body:
We need to make sure this all works in cross-dc situations

- [x] Define new table for storing task queue metadata
- [x] Update internal VersioningData structure
- [x] Update versioning API backend to use new table and structure
- [x] Implement version set merge
- [x] Implement user data replication
- [x] Making build ID update idempotent (required for retries)
- [x] Redirect {Get,Update}WorkerBuildIdCompatibility requests to active cluster
- [x] Implement mechanism for seeding new cluster's task queue user data
- [x] More tests
title: Propagate versioning data during replication
